# QCPG++

## Text Diversity Metrics 
```
Semantic Similarity: Bleurt Score
Syntactic Diversity: Constituency Parse Tree edit distance
Lexical Diversity: Character-level edit distance 
Phonological Diversity: Rhythmic Diversity
Morphological Diversity: POS edit distance.
```
